name: unit
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: unit
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a single thing or a separate part of something larger

example.eg: Each unit of the text book focuses on a different grammar point.
example.egtrans: 课本的每个单元各有不同的语法重点。

example.eg: The first year of the course is divided into four units.
example.egtrans: 该课程的第一年分为4个单元。

example.eg: The company plans to split into two or three units.
example.egtrans: 公司计划拆分成三个部分。

trans_examp.trans_en: a piece of furniture or equipment that is intended to be fitted as a part of a set of similar or matching pieces
a small machine or part of a machine that has a particular purpose

example.eg: the central processing unit of a computer

trans_examp.trans_en: a single complete product of the type that a business sells
a single apartment in a bigger building

example.eg: The old house has been divided up into three rental units.
example.egtrans: 这栋老房子被分成三套住房出租。

dsense.name: unit
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a group of people living or working together, especially for a particular purpose
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指具有特定目的的）班组，小队

example.eg: Both soldiers spent two weeks in training before being allowed to rejoin their unit (= the particular part of the army to which they belonged).
example.egtrans: 两名士兵均在接受了两周的训练后才被允许归队。

example.eg: Dr Nussbaum is director of the Civil Liberties Research Unit at King's College, London.
example.egtrans: 努斯鲍姆博士是伦敦国王学院公民自由研究中心的主任。

dsense.name: unit
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a standard measure that is used to express amounts

example.eg: A centimetre is a unit of length.
The standard unit of currency in the US is the dollar.
example.egtrans: 美国的标准货币单位是美元。

example.eg: Experts say that women should not drink more than 14 units of alcohol a week.
example.egtrans: 专家称妇女每周饮酒不要超过14个酒精单位。

dsense.name: unit
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a department in a hospital for the treatment of people with similar illnesses or conditions

example.egtrans: 她在烧伤科／儿科／精神科。

dsense.name: unit
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: any whole number less than ten

example.eg: Tens go in the left-hand column and units in the right.
example.egtrans: 十位数在左栏，个位数在右栏。
